entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • keyboard problem #18939
  • [Windows] Setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #18937
  • Custom selection styles for items in CollectionView are ignored when programmatically selecting an item #18933
  • Using Nightly builds (8.0.0-nightly) breaks packages that require >= 8.0.3 #18931
  • [Android] Label text not wrapping inside AbsoluteLayout #18930
    Backlog
  • BundleConfig.json not working for language in release mode for .aab files. #18929
  • There isn't the "Additional information" window in my VS 2022 17.8. #18928
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. Tried to install it using "dotnet new install Microsoft.MAUI.Templates", the MAUI option showed up, but now after creation of a MAUI project, it says "Unloaded" #18927
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. #18926
  • Border StrokeShape performance issues #18925
  • Wrong button width when using ImageSource #18924
  • Publish IOS App Error ZipArchive.framework/ZipArchive' contains bitcode. #18920
  • Secure Storage GetAsync returns null in MAUI .NET 7 Android #18914

Closed

  • After installing .NET 8, the MAUI workload does not work in vscode. [macos] [vscode] #18935
  • Flyout title doesn't switch on Detail change #18830
  • [Enhancement] Add IsVisible to MenuItem #18792
  • Regression Android: Border in a Frame results in an empty Frame #18922
  • MAUI Android MainPage assignments break (or crash) the app if it's backgrounded or OnResume #18921
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] - modal to modal doesnt call OnNavigatedTo #17978
    .NET 8 SR2
  • CollectionView strange load behavior for WinUI #18913

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Make sure always call decisionHandler even if no handler #18934
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • Cv size alternate #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18916
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview1.23165.1 to 8.0.0 #18866
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix "Test attachment file path could not be found" #18911
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update DEVELOPMENT doc to use VS Code on Mac #18859
  • Fix Modal OnNavigatedTo #18912

Updated

  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, control-menubar, stale, Under Consideration
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [X] allow x:Type extension for BPConverter #18540
    area/Xaml </>, stale
  • Add unit tests to verify button's command is not messing up with manually set IsEnabled #18525
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, community ✨, control-button, stale
  • Backport #16762 - [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #18463
    area/ListView, stale
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Create a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui .NET SDK #14640
    area/setup 🪄, stale
  • fix 18457 #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • [Windows] Address CollectionView virtualization #18813
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [tests] Ignore flaky android tests #18905
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18553
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
